contentBlocks.title: Determine Implementation Level of Effort (LOE)
contentBlocks.description: Run through this checklist to determine the level of effort for implementation.

columns.title: Low LOE
items: Documented REST based API's for LUA and actions OR OOTB integrations
Documented style guides and deployment processes

columns.title: Medium LOE
items: Documented REST Based APIs for data retrieval but no API's for Actions for LUA
3rd party WFM system with a Gladly partner
Data export requirements to a data warehouse

columns.title: High LOE
items: No style guides or multiple style guides for each business line
Outdated Answer content and/or separate Answer content for each business line
3rd party WFM system that is not a Gladly partner and connectors will need to be built
